title: East London Hotel with Daily Breakfast near Bluewater Shopping Centre
description: Step into the lively outskirts of greater London from your comfortable stay at Holiday Inn Express London - Dartford, an IHG Hotel. Spend a day at the nearby Bluewater Shopping Centre - one of the largest malls in the UK - or enjoy some family fun at the magical Leeds Castle. If business calls, enjoy a complimentary Grab&Go brekkie then zip into central London on a quick tube ride. When you return, wind down with a nice pizza and pint in the lounge.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express London - Dartford, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: University Way, Dartford, DA1 5PA, United Kingdom
